cult-encounter-cards.expansionSet: the black goat of the woods

cult-encounter.title: A Simple Choice

lore.i: "These tools are for the collective good."

cult-encounter.entry: Draw 1 Common item, then either discard a different item or draw a Corruption card.

cult-encounter.title: A Simple Choice

lore.i: "These tools are for the collective good."

cult-encounter.entry: Draw 1 Common item, then either discard a different item or draw a Corruption card.

cult-encounter.title: Baptized in Blood

lore.i: "Kneel and receive the Mother's Blessing!"

cult-encounter.entry: You may choose to be blessed, then lose 2 Sanity and draw a Corruption card. If you choose not to do so, you are Cursed and must discard your Cult Membership, then move to the street.

cult-encounter.title: Birthing Chant

lore.i: "Iä! Iä! Shub-Niggurath! The Black Goat of the Woods with a Thousand Young!"

cult-encounter.entry: Out of the darkness a grotesque monster appears!

cult-encounter.title: Blood Offering

lore.i: "Service demands sacrifice."

cult-encounter.entry: Either discard 1 Ally, discard 2 toughness worth of monster trophies, or lose 3 Stamina. If you cannot or will not do any of these things, discard your Cult Membership and move to the street.

cult-encounter.title: Blood-drenched Altar

lore.i: The chanting seems to echo through the trees and in your mind as the circle leader makes a series of ritual cuts in the beast's flesh.

cult-encounter.entry: Raise the terror level by 1.

cult-encounter.title: Calling forth the Darkness

lore.i: "Hooded figures kneel before a stone altar and begin a blasphemous ritual that draws power from a dark and malevolent source."

cult-encounter.entry: If you participate in the ceremony, each investigator must draw a Corruption card. If you choose not to do so, a monster surge occurs.

cult-encounter.title: Curious Endowment

lore.i: A shadowy figure reveals two strange items and whispers"Choose wisely, friend"

cult-encounter.entry: You may draw 2 Unique items, choose one to keep, and discard the other. If you do, draw a Corruption card. Otherwise, move to the street.

cult-encounter.title: Dance of the Chosen

lore.i: Deranged figures gyrate around the bonfire, beseeching the Black Goat for power.

cult-encounter.entry: You may draw 2 Spells, choose one to keep, and discard the other. If you do, draw a Corruption card. Otherwise, move to the street.

cult-encounter.title: Dance of the Chosen

lore.i: Deranged figures gyrate around the bonfire, beseeching the Black Goat for power.

cult-encounter.entry: You may draw 2 Spells, choose one to keep, and discard the other. If you do, draw a Corruption card. Otherwise, move to the street.

cult-encounter.title: No Turning Back

lore.i: Your quickened heartbeat and the drone of chanting voices create a strange rhythm as you approach the stone altar. You hesitate, then step into its long shadow and feel a bit of your humanity slip away.

cult-encounter.entry: Draw a Corruption card.

cult-encounter.title: No Turning Back

lore.i: Your quickened heartbeat and the drone of chanting voices create a strange rhythm as you approach the stone altar. You hesitate, then step into its long shadow and feel a bit of your humanity slip away.

cult-encounter.entry: Draw a Corruption card.

cult-encounter.title: Questioned Loyalty

lore.i: "New members often struggle with total commitment", says a senior cult member. "But, a few honest answers about your recent activities should reassure us."

cult-encounter.entry: Discard 2 Clue tokens, if able. You may reduce this loss by 1 for each Corruption card you have. If you cannot or will not, lose 2 Stamina and move to the street.

cult-encounter.title: Startling Revelation

lore.i: "You bump into a pair of cloaked figures conversing in the darkness and are shocked that you recognize them both!"

cult-encounter.entry: Return 2 Allies from the Ally deck to the box. They have joined "One of the Thousand" Cult!

cult-encounter.title: Teetering Sanity

lore.i: The reality of the situation suddenly slaps you in the face. Questioning your motives, you wonder when all of this became so compelling...

cult-encounter.entry: Lose 2 Sanity.

cult-encounter.title: Tempations of Power

lore.i: "The Black Goat favors you."

cult-encounter.entry: You may search the Spell deck for a card of your choice, then lose 1 Sanity and draw a Corruption card. If you choose not to do so, discard your Cult Membership and move to the street.

cult-encounter.title: The Chosen One

lore.i: You stand before the stone altar, knife in hand. Will it be another's blood, or your own that you shed?

cult-encounter.entry: You must either draw 2 Corruption cards and add 1 doom token to the doom track, or remove 1 doom token from the doom track and be devoured.

cult-encounter.title: Tithes That Bind

lore.i: "We require a small donation."

cult-encounter.entry: Spend $3 (or discard items worth at least $3) to gain 2 Clue tokens and a Corruption card. If you cannot or will not, discard your Cult Membership and move to the street.

cult-encounter.title: Tithes That Bind

lore.i: "We require a small donation."

cult-encounter.entry: Spend $3 (or discard items worth at least $3) to gain 2 Clue tokens and a Corruption card. If you cannot or will not, discard your Cult Membership and move to the street.

cult-encounter.title: Unbreakable Oath

lore.i: "The Mother's milk is her most sacred gift. Drink deeply."

cult-encounter.entry: You may search the Unique item deck for a Milk of Shub-Niggurath card, if it is available. If you do, draw a Corruption card. Otherwise move to the street.

cult-encounter.title: Watching and Waiting

lore.i: Cautious subterfuge earns you a glimpse at things to come, yet there is truth in the old adage about the bliss of ignorance.

cult-encounter.entry: You may either gain 1 Clue token, or 3 Clue tokens and a Corruption card.

cult-encounter.title: Watching and Waiting

lore.i: Cautious subterfuge earns you a glimpse at things to come, yet there is truth in the old adage about the bliss of ignorance.

cult-encounter.entry: You may either gain 1 Clue token, or 3 Clue tokens and a Corruption card.

cult-encounter.title: Whispers in Shadows

lore.i: "Take this to help with your cause, friend."

cult-encounter.entry: You may either gain $3 and draw a Corruption card, or move to the street.
